tr_quotes.quote: Eğer bir kişi tanımadıklarına karşı nazik ve kibar ise, o kişi bir dünya vatandaşıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

tr_quotes.quote: Nazik ol, tanıştığımız herkes zorlu bir savaş veriyor.
tr_quotes.author: Plato

tr_quotes.quote: Her zaman iyiliğe karşı duyarlı ol, diğerlerinin hatalarına değil.
tr_quotes.author: Buddha

tr_quotes.quote: Akılsızın kalbi ağzındadır, ama akıllı insanın ağzı kalbindedir.
tr_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

tr_quotes.quote: Saygı, satın alınmaz, kazanılır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Saygı, düzenin anahtarıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Atatürk

tr_quotes.quote: Zamana büyük saygı duy.
tr_quotes.author: Richard Baxter

tr_quotes.quote: Nazik insan nezaketi nezaketsizden öğrenir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Saygı, çok kere korkunun söylenmeyen şeklidir.
tr_quotes.author: Cenap Sahabettin

tr_quotes.quote: Nazik insan, nezaketi nezaketsizden öğrenir.
tr_quotes.author: Lord Halifax

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatın anlamı insanın doğasına saygı gösteren kişisel bir ahlak geliştirmek ve bu ahlakla yaşamaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Aki Kaurismaki

tr_quotes.quote: Bana büyüklerime saygılı olmamı öğrettiler; artık kimseye saygı duymama gerek kalmadı.
tr_quotes.author: George Burns

tr_quotes.quote: Babana hürmet etki, çocuklarında sana hürmet etsin.
tr_quotes.author: Hz.Ali

tr_quotes.quote: Büyüklerime hürmet; vazifem ve arzumdur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İdeal insan; özel hayatında ciddi, kendinden üstündekilere saygılı, halkla ilişkilerinde iyiliksever ve adildir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan sevgi ve saygıyı küçük yaşta öğrenmelidir ki bunu büyüdükçe daha da geliştirsin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer bir ailede aile içerisinde çocuğa saygı, sevgi, hoşgörü öğretilirse, o çocuk hayatı boyunca büyüklerine saygı, küçüklerine sevgi duyacaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer yasalara saygı gösterilmesini istiyorsak, önce saygı duyulacak yasalar yapmak gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Louis Brandeis

tr_quotes.quote: Gençliğe, yaşlılıktan çok saygı göstermeliyiz.
tr_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

tr_quotes.quote: Saygı, çok kere korkunun söylenmeyen şeklidir.
tr_quotes.author: Cenap Sahabettin

tr_quotes.quote: Nehrin kaynağına saygısı, denize doğru akmasıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Recâ Garudi

tr_quotes.quote: Çocuklara, saygıyı öğretmenin en iyi yolu: onlara saygı göstermektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sen bakmasını bil de dikende gül gör, dikensiz gülü herkes görür.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Ey oğul; ananı, atanı say, bereket büyüklerle beraberdir.
tr_quotes.author: Şeyh Edebali

tr_quotes.quote: Saygı satın alınmaz kazanılır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Gençlerin pek çoğu kabalıklarını tabiilik zannederler.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Nezaket hiçten gelir fakat her şeyi satın alır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer sevgi bir çiçekse,sevgi onun koruyan saksıdır.Çiçek solmaya başlamışsa dikat edin saksı mutlaka çatlamıştır.
tr_quotes.author: Erich Fromm

tr_quotes.quote: Saygı,içinde sevgi olmayan bir boşluğu doldurmak için yaratılmıştır.
tr_quotes.author: Lev Tolstoy

tr_quotes.quote: Din,dil,milliyet ve ırk demeden her insana saygı gösterin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Saygı kayığına binmeden sevgi denizi geçilmez.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Büyüklerime hürmet; vazifem ve arzumdur.
tr_quotes.author: Budha

tr_quotes.quote: Büyüklere saygı hem dini hem de insani bir görevdir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Başkalarını nezakete davet etmek için bazen kaba görünmek gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan zekanın karşısında saygıyla eğilir, ama iyi davranış ve şefkatin önünde diz çöker.
tr_quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

tr_quotes.quote: Büyükleri ve geçmişteki değerleri saygı ile ananlar, saygıyla anılırlar.
tr_quotes.author: Hakkı Balıkçızade

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatımıza giren herkes değerlidir, ama herkes özel değildir. Saygı hepsine, sevgi layık olana verilir.
tr_quotes.author: Erich Fromm

tr_quotes.quote: En insani davranış, bir insanın utanılacak duruma düşmesini önlemektir.
tr_quotes.author: Nietsche

tr_quotes.quote: Sevgi ne kadar büyükse kederi de o kadar büyük olacaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Aklımda merak, şüphe ve saygı uyandıran iki şey vardır: Üzerimde yıldız gibi parlayan cennet ve içimdeki ahlak yasası.
tr_quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

tr_quotes.quote: Saygı olan yerde korku olur; ama korku olan yerde her zaman saygı olmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Eflatun

tr_quotes.quote: Kişinin kendi nefsine göstereceği saygı, saygıların en büyüğüdür.
tr_quotes.author: Beydeba

tr_quotes.quote: Saygı, çok kere korkunun söylenmeyen şeklidir.
tr_quotes.author: Cenap Sahabettin

tr_quotes.quote: Büyüklerime hürmet; vazifem ve arzumdur.
tr_quotes.author: Budha

tr_quotes.quote: Sen bakmasını bil de dikende gül gör dikensiz gülü herkes görür.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kitaplar kendinize ve başkalarına saygı duymayı öğretecek,yüreği ve aklı,dünya ve insanlık sevgisiyle dolduracaktır
tr_quotes.author: Maksim Gorki

tr_quotes.quote: Hürmet, çok kere bir korkunun şeklidir.
tr_quotes.author: Cenap Sahabettin

tr_quotes.quote: İncelik, aslında bir tür akıl okumadır.
tr_quotes.author: Sarah Orne Jewett

tr_quotes.quote: Güvenli davranış tarzının iki yönü vardır: Kendi haklarınızı göz ardı etmeden başkalarının haklarına saygı göstermek.
tr_quotes.author: Sue Bishop

tr_quotes.quote: Saygı olan yerde korku olur; ama korku olan yerde her zaman saygı olmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Eflatun

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçek sevgi, iyilik gördüğünde artmayan, kötülük gördüğünde eksilmeyendir.
tr_quotes.author: Muaz

tr_quotes.quote: Başkalarının düşüncelerine saygı gösterin, hiç kimseye yanlış düşündüğünü söylemeyin.
tr_quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

tr_quotes.quote: Başkalarına saygı duymayan kendine saygı duymaz.
tr_quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoyevski

tr_quotes.quote: Başkasının fikrine saygı duymak, ondan yararlı bir şey alma yeteneği her bir kişiye gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Haydar Aliyev

tr_quotes.quote: Kendinden büyüğe saygı göstermeli, kendinden küçüğe ise şefkat
tr_quotes.author: Yusuf Has Hacib

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan, babasına borçlu olduğu saygıyı ancak baba olduğu zaman duyar.
tr_quotes.author: Goeth

tr_quotes.quote: Açlığın her şeyi bastırdığı bir manzarada yok edilemeyen sadece iki değer vardır…Bunlar onur ve saygıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Susanna Tamaro

tr_quotes.quote: Başarılı olmak kolay, saygıdeğer olmak zordur. Kazanmak için tüm etik ve ahlaki değerleri ezip geçenler başarılı olur ama saygıdeğer olamaz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

en_quotes.quote: Knowledge will give you power, but character respect
en_quotes.author: Bruce Lee

en_quotes.quote: Respect for ourselves guides our morals, respect for others guides our manners
en_quotes.author: Laurence Sterne

en_quotes.quote: Self-respect is the fruit of discipline; the sense of dignity grows with the ability to say no to oneself
en_quotes.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

en_quotes.quote: There are lots of people I admire and respect, but I don't necessarily want to be like them. I'm too happy being myself
en_quotes.author: James D'arcy

en_quotes.quote: When you are content to be simply yourself and don't compare or compete, everybody will respect you
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: I love making new friends and I respect people for a lot of different reasons
en_quotes.author: Taylor Swift

en_quotes.quote: Different people have different opinions, and it's okay to respect all of them
en_quotes.author: Juan Pablo Galavis

en_quotes.quote: One of the most sincere forms of respect is actually listening to what another has to say
en_quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

en_quotes.quote: A great chef is an artist that I truly respect
en_quotes.author: Robert Stack

en_quotes.quote: I'm just here to say, 'Just be a good person, and really respect others.'
en_quotes.author: Logic

en_quotes.quote: I believe in one power, and that is the hand of God. I respect all religions
en_quotes.author: Lata Mangeshkar

en_quotes.quote: If we are not free, no one will respect us
en_quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

en_quotes.quote: The final test of a gentleman is his respect for those who can be of no possible service to him
en_quotes.author: William Lyon Phelps

en_quotes.quote: I'm a good girl because I really believe in love, integrity, and respect. I'm a bad girl because I like to tease
en_quotes.author: Katy Perry

en_quotes.quote: I respect everybody. You don't have to earn my respect. You earn my disrespect
en_quotes.author: Charlie Murphy

en_quotes.quote: Respect your partner. Be happy in your partner's happiness
en_quotes.author: Divyanka Tripathi

en_quotes.quote: Without feelings of respect, what is there to distinguish men from beasts?
en_quotes.author: Confucius

en_quotes.quote: I'm not concerned with your liking or disliking me... All I ask is that you respect me as a human being
en_quotes.author: Jackie Robinson

en_quotes.quote: Respect is one of life's greatest treasures. I mean, what does it all add up to if you don't have that?
en_quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

en_quotes.quote: If your religion doesn't respect the rights of other religions, it is lacking something
en_quotes.author: Roger Ebert

en_quotes.quote: There's heart and soul in everyone, and we need to respect people's choices
en_quotes.author: Kubra Sait

en_quotes.quote: There is no respect for others without humility in one's self
en_quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

en_quotes.quote: We need to respect the oceans and take care of them as if our lives depended on it. Because they do
en_quotes.author: Sylvia Earle

en_quotes.quote: The people respect and believe in men who fulfill their duty
en_quotes.author: Fidel Castro

en_quotes.quote: Be loyal to those who are loyal to you. And respect everyone, even your enemies and competition
en_quotes.author: John Cena

en_quotes.quote: Once you figure out what respect tastes like, it tastes better than attention. But you have to get there
en_quotes.author: Pink

en_quotes.quote: Love is about mutual respect, apart from attraction
en_quotes.author: George Best

en_quotes.quote: I'm just trying to approach what I make with as much respect and research as I can, and just make it with a good heart
en_quotes.author: Garth Davis

en_quotes.quote: Mutual respect! That's what it takes to be friends
en_quotes.author: Hugo Chavez

en_quotes.quote: I love and respect my sport, but I am not a bad guy. First, I am a sportsman
en_quotes.author: Gennady Golovkin

en_quotes.quote: I think a lot of people have lost respect for the individual, you know, the individual, the person who doesn't conform
en_quotes.author: Erykah Badu

en_quotes.quote: Do we not realize that self respect comes with self reliance?
en_quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

en_quotes.quote: I have respect for beer
en_quotes.author: Russell Crowe

en_quotes.quote: Love, friendship and respect do not unite people as much as a common hatred for something
en_quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

en_quotes.quote: Let every man be respected as an individual and no man idolized
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: Grace, respect, reserve, and empathetic listening are qualities sorely missing from the public discourse now
en_quotes.author: Meryl Streep

en_quotes.quote: The biggest ingredient in a best friend is someone whose actions you respect and who you can truly be yourself around
en_quotes.author: Renee Olstead

en_quotes.quote: Treat everyone with respect and kindness. Period. No exceptions
en_quotes.author: Kiana Tom

en_quotes.quote: If man doesn't learn to treat the oceans and the rain forest with respect, man will become extinct
en_quotes.author: Peter Benchley

en_quotes.quote: To be one, to be united is a great thing. But to respect the right to be different is maybe even greater
en_quotes.author: Bono

en_quotes.quote: Direct confrontation, direct conversation is real respect. And it's amazing how many people get that
en_quotes.author: Penn Jillette

en_quotes.quote: Golf is game of respect and sportsmanship; we have to respect its traditions and its rules
en_quotes.author: Jack Nicklaus

en_quotes.quote: I'm not a horror guy, it's not my thing, but I respect it a lot. I know how hard it is to make, especially to make good
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Tucker

en_quotes.quote: I am being selfish here by saying this, but I believe 'Barfi!' helped me the most. It got me recognition and respect
en_quotes.author: Ileana D'Cruz

en_quotes.quote: We all require and want respect, man or woman, black or white. It's our basic human right
en_quotes.author: Aretha Franklin

en_quotes.quote: I respect the Indian government for the fact that there are no settlements in Kashmir
en_quotes.author: Zubin Mehta

en_quotes.quote: For me, respect is important
en_quotes.author: Lukas Podolski

en_quotes.quote: We must respect the past, and mistrust the present, if we wish to provide for the safety of the future
en_quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

en_quotes.quote: There is respect for law, and then there is complicity in lawlessness
en_quotes.author: Rebecca MacKinnon

en_quotes.quote: If you don't stand for something, how can anyone respect what you do?
en_quotes.author: Miranda Lambert

en_quotes.quote: If you have ten thousand regulations you destroy all respect for the law
en_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

en_quotes.quote: If we desire respect for the law, we must first make the law respectable
en_quotes.author: Louis D. Brandeis

en_quotes.quote: Just imagine how different the world could be if we all spoke to everyone with respect and kindness
en_quotes.author: Holly Branson

en_quotes.quote: You can have a certain arrogance, and I think that's fine, but what you should never lose is the respect for the others
en_quotes.author: Steffi Graf

en_quotes.quote: We do not covet anything from any nation except their respect
en_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

en_quotes.quote: I get no respect. The way my luck is running, if I was a politician I would be honest
en_quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

en_quotes.quote: I have great respect for the semicolon; it is a mighty handy little fellow
en_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

en_quotes.quote: Aging has a wonderful beauty and we should have respect for that
en_quotes.author: Eartha Kitt

en_quotes.quote: With all due respect, the Mona Lisa is overrated
en_quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

en_quotes.quote: I come from a poor family, I have seen poverty. The poor need respect, and it begins with cleanliness
en_quotes.author: Narendra Modi

en_quotes.quote: When values disappear, the first people to suffer are women because people start losing their respect for women
en_quotes.author: Rula Ghani

en_quotes.quote: Nothing is more despicable than respect based on fear
en_quotes.author: Albert Camus

en_quotes.quote: The point of feminism is you shouldn't have to be a man to be treated with equal respect
en_quotes.author: Kimberle Williams Crenshaw

en_quotes.quote: I respect Jay-Z. I like him
en_quotes.author: Paul Anka

en_quotes.quote: I have a respect for manners as such, they are a way of dealing with people you don't agree with or like
en_quotes.author: Margaret Mead

en_quotes.quote: In Republics, the great danger is, that the majority may not sufficiently respect the rights of the minority
en_quotes.author: James Madison

en_quotes.quote: The way forward is always found through greater respect for the equal rights of all
en_quotes.author: Martin O'Malley

en_quotes.quote: We don't need to share the same opinions as others, but we need to be respectful
en_quotes.author: Taylor Swift

en_quotes.quote: Compassion, loyalty, and respect sum up love for me - it's a mix that's very rare to find and even harder to imbibe
en_quotes.author: Jennifer Winget

en_quotes.quote: I firmly believe that respect is a lot more important, and a lot greater, than popularity
en_quotes.author: Julius Erving

en_quotes.quote: Fabric is the most extraordinary thing; it has life. You must respect the fabric
en_quotes.author: Hubert de Givenchy

en_quotes.quote: Economics is a subject that does not greatly respect one's wishes
en_quotes.author: Nikita Khrushchev

en_quotes.quote: I never make the mistake of arguing with people for whose opinions I have no respect
en_quotes.author: Edward Gibbon

en_quotes.quote: The people I respect the least are the ones that take themselves way too seriously
en_quotes.author: Corey Taylor

en_quotes.quote: I dislike math, yet I respect and appreciate the fact that math is the language of the universe
en_quotes.author: Lucas Grabeel

en_quotes.quote: Employees don't need to be best friends, but there does need to be a level of mutual respect and understanding
en_quotes.author: Kathryn Minshew

en_quotes.quote: Software eventually and necessarily gained the same respect as any other discipline
en_quotes.author: Margaret H. Hamilton

en_quotes.quote: What I have known with respect to myself, has tended much to lessen both my admiration, and my contempt, of others
en_quotes.author: Joseph Priestley

en_quotes.quote: If we have no respect for our viewers, then how can we have any respect for ourselves and what we do?
en_quotes.author: Christiane Amanpour

en_quotes.quote: America wants its respect
en_quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

en_quotes.quote: You have to respect your audience. Without them, you're essentially standing alone, singing to yourself
en_quotes.author: K. D. Lang

en_quotes.quote: There's no right way to be a woman; there's only a right way to be a human, which is to have respect for others
en_quotes.author: Anitta

en_quotes.quote: I think as long as you wear your imperfections on your sleeve, people respect it more
en_quotes.author: Shamir

en_quotes.quote: There's no glory and no respect in making fun of the weak, the powerless
en_quotes.author: Bassem Youssef

en_quotes.quote: The challenge is to get everyone to respect music again, to recognize its value
en_quotes.author: Jay-Z

en_quotes.quote: You can be rivals out on the pitch, but respect is the most important thing
en_quotes.author: Hugo Lloris

en_quotes.quote: I have nothing but respect for the Lakers. So many of their legends shaped who I am as a person and player
en_quotes.author: Bill Walton

en_quotes.quote: I respect people of all sexualities; I respect people of all religions, all faiths. I love all Australians
en_quotes.author: Scott Morrison

en_quotes.quote: Life is short, and we should respect every moment of it
en_quotes.author: Orhan Pamuk

en_quotes.quote: Being identified as a poet in France or Denmark or India one is greeted with gracious respect
en_quotes.author: James Broughton

en_quotes.quote: I don't really consider myself a model, to be honest. I respect designers; I think it's another art, you know
en_quotes.author: Josephine de La Baume

en_quotes.quote: I like and respect Elisabeth Hasselbeck so much. I'm from a political party that represents half the country
en_quotes.author: Nicolle Wallace

en_quotes.quote: There exist only three beings worthy of respect: the priest, the soldier, the poet. To know, to kill, to create
en_quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

en_quotes.quote: Treating your adversary with respect is striking soft in battle
en_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

en_quotes.quote: I'm fiercely patriotic, and the flag and the anthem is something that I really, really respect
en_quotes.author: Abby Wambach

en_quotes.quote: Some people lose all respect for the lion unless he devours them instantly. There is no pleasing some people
en_quotes.author: Will Cuppy

en_quotes.quote: When people do not respect us we are sharply offended; yet in his private heart no man much respects himself
en_quotes.author: Mark Twain

en_quotes.quote: Many people resented my impatience and honesty, but I never cared about acceptance as much as I cared about respect
en_quotes.author: Jackie Robinson

en_quotes.quote: The only thing I command is respect
en_quotes.author: Kyrie Irving

en_quotes.quote: Respect is one of the greatest expressions of love
en_quotes.author: Don Miguel Ruiz

en_quotes.quote: If once you forfeit the confidence of your fellow-citizens, you can never regain their respect and esteem
en_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

en_quotes.quote: At sea a fellow comes out. Salt water is like wine, in that respect
en_quotes.author: Herman Melville

en_quotes.quote: Men have a respect for scholarship and learning greatly out of proportion to the use they commonly serve
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: It is not desirable to cultivate a respect for the law, so much as for the right
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: I respect myself and insist upon it from everybody. And because I do it, I then respect everybody, too
en_quotes.author: Maya Angelou

en_quotes.quote: Go up close to your friend, but do not go over to him! We should also respect the enemy in our friend
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: The bad gains respect through imitation, the good loses it especially in art
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: I have always fought for respect, I have always fought for survival, so fighting is nothing new to me
en_quotes.author: Vijay Deverakonda

en_quotes.quote: The gifts of lovers to one another are, in respect to love, nothing but forms; yet, they testify to invisible love
en_quotes.author: Rumi

en_quotes.quote: I look forward to a life partner who can look after me and respect me
en_quotes.author: Divyanka Tripathi

en_quotes.quote: Goodness and hard work are rewarded with respect
en_quotes.author: Luther Campbell

en_quotes.quote: Every individual has a place to fill in the world and is important in some respect whether he chooses to be so or not
en_quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

en_quotes.quote: Respect for the fragility and importance of an individual life is still the mark of an educated man
en_quotes.author: Norman Cousins

en_quotes.quote: In the Army, I learned how to use and respect my rifle
en_quotes.author: Jason Kander

en_quotes.quote: Being brilliant is no great feat if you respect nothing
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: I think I'm a natural-born leader. I know how to bow down to authority if it's authority that I respect
en_quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

en_quotes.quote: We have tolerance, respect, and equality in our written laws but not in the hearts of some of our people
en_quotes.author: Ruby Bridges

en_quotes.quote: I believe mutual respect for one another and cooperation should be the basis for relationships with foreign nations
en_quotes.author: Narendra Modi

en_quotes.quote: Respect the burden
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

en_quotes.quote: That's what people respect, the fact that I wasn't a chump that laid on his back and gave up
en_quotes.author: Mike Tyson

en_quotes.quote: Gymnastics taught me everything - life lessons, responsibility and discipline and respect
en_quotes.author: Shawn Johnson

en_quotes.quote: I think, in any debate, you have to respect the other person's point of view, if you agree or disagree
en_quotes.author: Michael Pena

en_quotes.quote: Respect... is appreciation of the separateness of the other person, of the ways in which he or she is unique
en_quotes.author: Annie Gottlieb

en_quotes.quote: How do leaders serve their people? They may pay good wages and treat employees with respect
en_quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

en_quotes.quote: Our high respect for a well read person is praise enough for literature
en_quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

en_quotes.quote: Respect for right conduct is felt by every body
en_quotes.author: Jane Austen

en_quotes.quote: Jerusalem is not just a beautiful city: the challenge is to show that Jerusalem can be shared in peace and respect
en_quotes.author: Federica Mogherini

en_quotes.quote: Show respect to all people, but grovel to none
en_quotes.author: Tecumseh

en_quotes.quote: Respect yourself if you would have others respect you
en_quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

en_quotes.quote: The highest ideals are human intelligence, creativity and love. Respect these above all
en_quotes.author: Penn Jillette

en_quotes.quote: Because we should always respect other nationalities, I have always tried to play them with dignity
en_quotes.author: Ricardo Montalban

en_quotes.quote: A brainy person does not abuse copyright; instead they respect it and uphold it
en_quotes.author: Maximillian Degenerez

en_quotes.quote: In writing, I apply my feminine side and respect the mystery involved in creation
en_quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

en_quotes.quote: Let them hate me, provided they respect my conduct
en_quotes.author: Tiberius

en_quotes.quote: Live with integrity, respect the rights of other people, and follow your own bliss
en_quotes.author: Nathaniel Branden

en_quotes.quote: Whatever woman I love... I gotta love her. She might be a hood rat, but she's gotta have respect for my mother
en_quotes.author: Astro

en_quotes.quote: People always have an opinion. Doesn't mean it's right, doesn't mean it's wrong, but we have to respect their opinion
en_quotes.author: Michael Clarke Duncan

en_quotes.quote: I'm the type of guy that always respect the older rappers who paved the way for us to get here
en_quotes.author: Playboi Carti

en_quotes.quote: I have great respect for the Pope. I like the Pope. I actually like him
en_quotes.author: Donald Trump

en_quotes.quote: I respect only those who resist me, but I cannot tolerate them
en_quotes.author: Charles de Gaulle

en_quotes.quote: I will not speak with disrespect of the Republican Party. I always speak with respect of the past
en_quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

en_quotes.quote: To retain respect for sausages and laws, one must not watch them in the making
en_quotes.author: Otto von Bismarck

en_quotes.quote: I have respect for therapists in general, because they hear so many stories. It's a lot to hold and take in
en_quotes.author: Jurnee Smollett-Bell

en_quotes.quote: Don't worry about what the people say; be yourself, say what you want to say with respect
en_quotes.author: Mariano Rivera

en_quotes.quote: I do respect people's faith, but I don't respect their manipulation of that faith in order to create fear and control
en_quotes.author: Javier Bardem

en_quotes.quote: It's important for couples to be friends first and to respect each other as individuals
en_quotes.author: Anupam Kher

en_quotes.quote: Freedom goes hand-in-hand with mutual respect
en_quotes.author: Kay Rala Xanana Gusmao

en_quotes.quote: Men are so willing to respect anything that bores them
en_quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

en_quotes.quote: Never fear a job, always respect it, and always leave yourself a hind door to escape. May your hind door always be open
en_quotes.author: Red Adair

en_quotes.quote: When about to commit a base deed, respect thyself, though there is no witness
en_quotes.author: Ausonius

en_quotes.quote: I deserve respect for the things I did not do
en_quotes.author: Dan Quayle

en_quotes.quote: I don't wait for people to give me respect. I always give them respect
en_quotes.author: Mariano Rivera

en_quotes.quote: I respect faith, but doubt is what gives you an education
en_quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

en_quotes.quote: By deafness one gains in one respect more than one loses; one misses more nonsense than sense
en_quotes.author: Horace Walpole

en_quotes.quote: All I ever seek from good deeds is a measure of respect
en_quotes.author: Walter Annenberg

en_quotes.quote: This is the final test of a gentleman: his respect for those who can be of no possible service to him
en_quotes.author: William Lyon Phelps

en_quotes.quote: Jack Welch is someone who I have always admired. In India, Narayana Murthy is someone who I have great respect for
en_quotes.author: Kumar Mangalam Birla

en_quotes.quote: I really respect certain brands, mixing and matching and having your own look regardless. Having a bold look
en_quotes.author: Kevin McHale

en_quotes.quote: Honoring the priesthood fosters respect, respect promotes reverence, and reverence invites revelation
en_quotes.author: Russell M. Nelson

en_quotes.quote: There was a side of me that knew I was gonna change the game, but I didn't know how many people would respect it
en_quotes.author: Nas

en_quotes.quote: I hate victims who respect their executioners
en_quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

en_quotes.quote: Harry Potter' gave me back self respect. Harry gave me a job to do that I loved more than anything else
en_quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

en_quotes.quote: When a woman removes her garment, she also removes the respect that is hers
en_quotes.author: Herodotus

en_quotes.quote: Ask an older person you respect to tell you his or her greatest regret
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Here's my gift-giving rule: Respect your current financial situation
en_quotes.author: Suze Orman

en_quotes.quote: I respect the audience's intelligence a lot, and that's why I don't try to go for the lowest common denominator
en_quotes.author: Spike Lee

en_quotes.quote: I'm sick of just liking people. I wish to God I could meet somebody I could respect
en_quotes.author: J. D. Salinger

en_quotes.quote: I don't envy or much respect people who are completely politicised
en_quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

en_quotes.quote: Your peers will respect you for your integrity and character, not your possessions
en_quotes.author: David Robinson

en_quotes.quote: Respect for the rights of others means peace
en_quotes.author: Benito Juarez

en_quotes.quote: I feel very passionate about maintaining the same level of standard and respect for the food as an Iron Chef myself
en_quotes.author: Alex Guarnaschelli

en_quotes.quote: I have a wonderful respect for old people
en_quotes.author: Craig Kilborn

en_quotes.quote: I respect anybody that is very in tune with their feelings
en_quotes.author: Blackbear

en_quotes.quote: Since I've started fighting it has taught me a lot about self respect, self confidence and self control
en_quotes.author: Gina Carano

en_quotes.quote: I think it is important that we respect that women have different political views
en_quotes.author: Cathy McMorris Rodgers

en_quotes.quote: Martial arts is about honor and respect
en_quotes.author: Rose Namajunas

en_quotes.quote: There are only two occasions when Americans respect privacy, especially in Presidents. Those are prayer and fishing
en_quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

en_quotes.quote: I respect coaches; I respect what good coaches do. I know that you don't learn to be a coach in an hour and a half
en_quotes.author: John Madden

en_quotes.quote: I want to be very close to someone I respect and admire and have somebody who feels the same way about me
en_quotes.author: Richard Bach

en_quotes.quote: When we respect everybody around us, we are in peace with everybody around us
en_quotes.author: Don Miguel Ruiz

en_quotes.quote: I respect Chris Brown. I'd like to call myself a friend - I don't know if I'm allowed to do that
en_quotes.author: Drake

en_quotes.quote: New York gave me hell for that 'Purple Swag,' man. They didn't respect me until 'Peso.'
en_quotes.author: ASAP Rocky

en_quotes.quote: Listen to your parents; respect them. They are well wishers
en_quotes.author: Sridevi

en_quotes.quote: By respect for life we become religious in a way that is elementary, profound and alive
en_quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

en_quotes.quote: The sea speaks a language polite people never repeat. It is a colossal scavenger slang and has no respect
en_quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

en_quotes.quote: I don't understand the lack of respect for amazing players when people say they are not good enough for me
en_quotes.author: Pep Guardiola

en_quotes.quote: Do dirt, get dirt. So I treat people with the same respect that I want
en_quotes.author: DMX

en_quotes.quote: I've got no respect for any young man who won't join the colors
en_quotes.author: Nathan Bedford Forrest

en_quotes.quote: We need to teach boys to respect girls
en_quotes.author: Urvashi Rautela

en_quotes.quote: I'm a good girl because I really believe in love, integrity, and respect
en_quotes.author: Katy Perry

en_quotes.quote: I respect the ones who make it and leave their home base, but I'm good in Colombia
en_quotes.author: J Balvin

en_quotes.quote: You have to discipline your children, or they won't respect you, law enforcement or God or anyone else
en_quotes.author: Phil Robertson

en_quotes.quote: I grew up with just my mum and sister, so I respect women a lot
en_quotes.author: Harry Styles

en_quotes.quote: By now, people should know who I am. I have established myself as Rich the Kid, so people respect me
en_quotes.author: Rich the Kid

en_quotes.quote: Mutual respect is very important in a relationship, and since my work is part of my life, he would have to respect it
en_quotes.author: Irina Shayk

en_quotes.quote: I can't predict the future and I don't have respect for people who try to
en_quotes.author: Jackie Mason

en_quotes.quote: I can only be inspired if I'm working with people that I really respect
en_quotes.author: Kali Uchis

en_quotes.quote: As long as you respect me, I'm a respect you
en_quotes.author: Ghostface Killah

en_quotes.quote: I believe no matter who you are, respect yourself, respect others
en_quotes.author: Mo Farah

en_quotes.quote: I come from a family where we were taught to love and respect every community and religion
en_quotes.author: Manisha Koirala

en_quotes.quote: I guess at the end of the day, all women like to be appreciated and treated with respect and kindness
en_quotes.author: Sofia Vergara

en_quotes.quote: When you get close to the raw materials and taste them at the moment they let go of the soil, you learn to respect them
en_quotes.author: Rene Redzepi

en_quotes.quote: Until we learn to honor and respect what other people believe, I think we are doomed
en_quotes.author: Patricia Polacco

en_quotes.quote: I respect my father as a father, but I also respect him as an honorable chairman
en_quotes.author: Akio Toyoda

en_quotes.quote: I have too much respect for the idea of God to make it responsible for such an absurd world
en_quotes.author: Georges Duhamel

en_quotes.quote: I actually like, love, and respect myself, and I try not to take anything too seriously
en_quotes.author: Jen Kirkman

en_quotes.quote: You can't respect yourself if you're afraid to be who you are
en_quotes.author: Amber Heard

en_quotes.quote: My sisters and mom raised me to respect women and open doors for them
en_quotes.author: Milo Ventimiglia

en_quotes.quote: I love hockey because of the respect for history and for the game itself
en_quotes.author: George Vecsey

en_quotes.quote: I have respect for all the clubs I used to play for
en_quotes.author: Carlos Tevez

en_quotes.quote: I fear God and respect God and love God
en_quotes.author: Brett Ratner

en_quotes.quote: High heels. I respect people who love them; they're just not for me!
en_quotes.author: Sophie Hawley-Weld

en_quotes.quote: I respect my competition
en_quotes.author: Rose Namajunas

en_quotes.quote: I have such respect for 'Democracy Now!'
en_quotes.author: Alice Walker

en_quotes.quote: Respect for self is the beginning of cultivating virtue in men and women
en_quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

en_quotes.quote: I'm getting my respect as a video director. The fashion industry respects me and knows who I am
en_quotes.author: ASAP Rocky

en_quotes.quote: I respect Apple. It's a great company that changed the world, especially the mobile time
en_quotes.author: Jack Ma

en_quotes.quote: The fans, with all due respect, they don't affect the decisions I would make as a coach
en_quotes.author: Bill Parcells

en_quotes.quote: I think we understand that for the Court to work well, we have to not only respect but genuinely like each other
en_quotes.author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

en_quotes.quote: I don't think socialism, and I don't think warmness and respect are necessarily bad words
en_quotes.author: Dave Matthews

en_quotes.quote: To get down to the quick of it, respect motivates me - not success
en_quotes.author: Hugh Jackman

en_quotes.quote: When you have that respect from your teammates, it makes it a lot more comfortable
en_quotes.author: LeBron James

en_quotes.quote: Respect the masterpiece. It is true reverence to man. There is no quality so great, none so much needed now
en_quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

en_quotes.quote: I always have tried to treat people with respect, the way I want to be treated
en_quotes.author: Derek Jeter

en_quotes.quote: I respect anybody that cooks. I know how hard it is
en_quotes.author: Guy Fieri

en_quotes.quote: I've spent a bit of time with the Prince of Wales, who I respect greatly. I'd give two cheers for the Monarchy
en_quotes.author: Sting

en_quotes.quote: What the Beatles did was something incredible, it was more than what a band could do. We have to give them respect
en_quotes.author: Yoko Ono

en_quotes.quote: I respect Lady Gaga very much
en_quotes.author: Yoko Ono

en_quotes.quote: When people do the cowardly thing, it's not about respect, it's about fear
en_quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

en_quotes.quote: I respect all grandpas around the world doin' it big
en_quotes.author: Machine Gun Kelly

en_quotes.quote: Civilization is a method of living, an attitude of equal respect for all men
en_quotes.author: Jane Addams

en_quotes.quote: Simple ingredients, treated with respect... put them together and you will always have a great dish
en_quotes.author: Jose Andres

en_quotes.quote: For a long time, we got no respect. People thought we just got lucky. They said we were a one-record wonder
en_quotes.author: Pepa

en_quotes.quote: I just work with people that I love and respect, that inspire me to be a better person, a better artist
en_quotes.author: J Balvin

en_quotes.quote: May the God of your choice bless and keep you. I respect Him as long as He does not circumcise me anymore
en_quotes.author: Kinky Friedman

en_quotes.quote: In societies that profess some respect for law, suspects are apprehended and brought to fair trial. I stress 'suspects.'
en_quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

en_quotes.quote: I have differences of opinion within my own family, an Irish Catholic family. So, I do respect those that disagree
en_quotes.author: Gavin Newsom

en_quotes.quote: The only situation that I can't be in favour of is the lack of respect to human rights in Venezuela
en_quotes.author: Mauricio Macri

en_quotes.quote: There is no tragedy in missing a putt, no matter how short. All have erred in this respect
en_quotes.author: Walter Hagen

en_quotes.quote: To be loved at first sight, a man should have at the same time something to respect and something to pity in his face
en_quotes.author: Stendhal

en_quotes.quote: I don't want or need to gain respect with what I do off the court. I want respect for what I do on the court
en_quotes.author: Vince Carter

en_quotes.quote: You have to love your body, respect it, and treat it well
en_quotes.author: Irina Shayk

en_quotes.quote: Take pride in your work at all times. Remember, respect for an umpire is created off the field as well as on
en_quotes.author: Ford Frick

en_quotes.quote: Germany has a deep respect for the Hart family, especially Bret 'The Hitman' Hart
en_quotes.author: Natalya Neidhart

en_quotes.quote: I have nothing but all the respect in the world for Jackie Robinson
en_quotes.author: Vernon Law

en_quotes.quote: I've done my work and I'm happy with it... I respect my father very much, but I'm a very different person than he was
en_quotes.author: Brandon Lee

en_quotes.quote: Religion is very important to me. I respect the rules of Islam, and I pray five times a day, always
en_quotes.author: Sadio Mane

en_quotes.quote: I love women, but I also respect them
en_quotes.author: Hayley Kiyoko

en_quotes.quote: I respect knowledge of the psyche. I would be a therapist if I weren't an entertainer
en_quotes.author: Jessica Simpson

en_quotes.quote: I have a lot of respect for tough coaches
en_quotes.author: Reggie White

en_quotes.quote: Ninety-nine percent of people now call me The Hoff - and it's out of respect
en_quotes.author: David Hasselhoff

en_quotes.quote: Never dress down for the poor. They won't respect you for it. They want their First Lady to look like a million dollars
en_quotes.author: Imelda Marcos

en_quotes.quote: If you don't treat an ingredient and its flavors with respect - if you drown it in oil, for instance - you'll spoil it
en_quotes.author: Alain Ducasse

en_quotes.quote: A role model can teach you to love and respect yourself
en_quotes.author: Tionne Watkins

en_quotes.quote: I think the way to keep a friendship is to respect that everybody is different
en_quotes.author: Emma Bunton

en_quotes.quote: Free trade is very important if we respect equality among nations
en_quotes.author: Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva

en_quotes.quote: This world belongs to all of us, and all sexes should be able to live in respect and harmony
en_quotes.author: Michelle Yeoh

en_quotes.quote: Responsibility and respect of others and their religious beliefs are also part of freedom
en_quotes.author: Horst Koehler

en_quotes.quote: Respect is what we owe; love, what we give
en_quotes.author: Philip James Bailey

en_quotes.quote: Jerusalem is holy to three religions. You have to respect that
en_quotes.author: Recep Tayyip Erdogan

en_quotes.quote: Every firing happens differently except in this one respect: the person being fired can't believe how fast it happens
en_quotes.author: Glenn Kelman

en_quotes.quote: The Bee Gees, to us, was the three brothers. In Maurice's name, we would respect that and not be the Bee Gees anymore
en_quotes.author: Robin Gibb

en_quotes.quote: My life has been forged by middle class values: faith, hard work, deep respect for America and all that she stands for
en_quotes.author: Dan Carter

en_quotes.quote: I've so much respect for Chelsea, and I love them
en_quotes.author: Michy Batshuayi

en_quotes.quote: I've got tremendous respect for different cultures, for the food and everything
en_quotes.author: Ian Rush

en_quotes.quote: This is my job and I respect it enough to concentrate on it
en_quotes.author: Andrew Bogut

en_quotes.quote: First Avenue is one of my favorite places to play. All along, they've treated me with respect
en_quotes.author: Lizzo

en_quotes.quote: We should all consider each other as human beings, and we should respect each other
en_quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

en_quotes.quote: If every man loves his mother, he's going to treat the ladies right, with love and respect
en_quotes.author: Mr. T

en_quotes.quote: Americans have been conditioned to respect newness, whatever it costs them
en_quotes.author: John Updike

en_quotes.quote: I don't take others' views seriously because that isn't a fact. I do respect everyone's view, but I am not affected
en_quotes.author: Disha Patani

en_quotes.quote: Men naturally despise those who court them, but respect those who do not give way to them
en_quotes.author: Thucydides

en_quotes.quote: If you respect a language and culture, it shows in your work
en_quotes.author: A. R. Rahman

en_quotes.quote: When I started training martial arts, I learned about respect
en_quotes.author: Anderson Silva

en_quotes.quote: I see the entire world as Eden, and every time you take an inch of it away, you must do so with respect
en_quotes.author: Joni Mitchell

en_quotes.quote: As the mother of two daughters, I have great respect for women. And I don't ever want to lose that
en_quotes.author: Vera Wang

en_quotes.quote: I've always treated women with dignity and respect
en_quotes.author: Brett Kavanaugh

en_quotes.quote: The way you respect hip-hop is by being true to yourself
en_quotes.author: Lil Dicky

en_quotes.quote: I don't have to participate in another culture's ceremonies in order to respect that culture
en_quotes.author: Sherman Alexie

en_quotes.quote: I have nothing against Dylan O'Brien! He's one of my favorite people. I have so much respect for him and his work
en_quotes.author: Katherine McNamara

en_quotes.quote: You've just got to earn my respect
en_quotes.author: Draymond Green

en_quotes.quote: When I am singing, I believe that if I respect the public, then they will respect me, and I know it. It's noticeable
en_quotes.author: Selena

en_quotes.quote: A good historian is timeless; although he is a patriot, he will never flatter his country in any respect
en_quotes.author: Francois Fenelon

en_quotes.quote: I always respect a woman
en_quotes.author: Enrique Iglesias

en_quotes.quote: In our culture we have such respect for musical instruments, they are like part of God
en_quotes.author: Ravi Shankar

en_quotes.quote: But really, we also need to learn how to love one another as women. How to appreciate and respect each other
en_quotes.author: Chaka Khan

en_quotes.quote: I have nothing against respecting people who lived before, but we have no responsibility toward them
en_quotes.author: Leon Kass

en_quotes.quote: Usually, family films have characters speaking with each other with much dignity and respect
en_quotes.author: Sunny Deol

en_quotes.quote: In this respect, the history of science, like the history of all civilization, has gone through cycles
en_quotes.author: Abdus Salam

en_quotes.quote: Our moral, religious, and political traditions are united in their respect for the dignity of human life
en_quotes.author: Robert Casey

en_quotes.quote: FIFA stands for discipline, respect, fair-play, not just on the field of play, but in our society as well
en_quotes.author: Sepp Blatter

en_quotes.quote: The Gandhi family has a tradition of being good hosts. When you call upon them, they treat you with a lot of respect
en_quotes.author: Sharad Pawar

en_quotes.quote: I have always believed that I should have had no difficulty in causing my rights to be respected
en_quotes.author: Eli Whitney

en_quotes.quote: Parents need to teach their children principles of respect and acceptance
en_quotes.author: Zachary Quinto

en_quotes.quote: Be modest, be respectful of others, try to understand
en_quotes.author: Lakhdar Brahimi

en_quotes.quote: People want to hear what I have to say and respect what I say
en_quotes.author: Jennifer Capriati

en_quotes.quote: If you respect the audience enough, they can take onboard many things
en_quotes.author: Nick Park

en_quotes.quote: It is so important to get respect for what you do and at the same time give it
en_quotes.author: Estelle Parsons

en_quotes.quote: Respect is not ever assigned; it's earned
en_quotes.author: Linda Tripp

en_quotes.quote: You don't say hello to Mr. DeNiro? Show the respect, will ya?
en_quotes.author: Joe Pesci
